repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:8-alpine

ENV NODE_ENV production

# Create app directory
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

# Install app dependencies
COPY . /usr/src/app
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;
RUN npm run build

EXPOSE 3000
CMD [ "node", "node_modules/.bin/next", "start" ]
